name: Siegebreaker

skills.name: Pelting Blows
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +5%

skills.name: Electrocute
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff for 1 turn if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Heavenly Roar
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks all enemies. Has a 50% Chance of decreasing the Turn Meter by 30% if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
